scripts.build: rm -rf build && webpack --config webpack.config.prod.js && cp ./index.html build && cp ./node_modules/babel-polyfill/dist/polyfill.min.js build && cp ./jquery.min.js build && cp ./manifest.webapp build && cp -r i18n build && cp -r dhis2 build && cp -r extjs build
